properties.name: leorces.compaction.enabled
properties.description: Whether compaction of completed process instances is enabled.

properties.name: leorces.compaction.batch-size
properties.description: Number of process instances to compact in one batch.

properties.name: leorces.compaction.cron
properties.description: Cron expression defining when compaction should run. Example: '0 0 0 * * *' for midnight every day.

properties.name: leorces.metrics.enabled
properties.description: Whether metrics collection is enabled for the engine.

properties.name: leorces.processes
properties.description: Map of process definitions, keyed by process name.

properties.name: leorces.processes.*.activity-retries
properties.description: Number of retry attempts for each activity in this process.

properties.name: leorces.processes.*.activity-timeout
properties.description: Default timeout for activities in this process (e.g., '1h', '30m').

properties.name: leorces.processes.*.activities
properties.description: Activity-level overrides for specific activities in the process.

properties.name: leorces.processes.*.activities.*.retries
properties.description: Number of retry attempts for this specific activity.

properties.name: leorces.processes.*.activities.*.timeout
properties.description: Timeout duration for this specific activity (e.g., '1h', '30m').

groups.name: leorces
groups.description: Main configuration group for Leorces Engine.

groups.name: leorces.compaction
groups.description: Settings for compaction of completed process instances.

groups.name: leorces.metrics
groups.description: Settings for metrics collection in the engine.

groups.name: leorces.processes.*.activities
groups.description: Activity-level configuration overrides for specific activities within a process.
